workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

actions.", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger_event", "description": "The event or condition that triggers the workflow", "type": "string", "example": "New issue created"}, {"name": "workflow_actions", "description": "The actions to be executed when the trigger event occurs", "type": "array of objects", "example": []}, {"name": "notifications", "description": "Specifies who should receive notifications when the workflow is triggered", "type": "array of strings", "example": ["DEVU-123", "DEVU-456"]}, {"name": "actions_log", "description": "Keeps a log of actions performed by the workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

sprint", "type": "string", "example": "Sprint 1"}, {"name": "sprint_duration", "description": "The duration of the sprint in weeks", "type": "integer", "example": 2}, {"name": "sprint_goals", "description": "Defines specific goals and objectives for the sprint (e.g., deliverables)", "type": "string", "example": "Complete user story implementations"}, {"name": "sprint_capacity", "description": "Sets the maximum capacity or workload for the sprint(Story Points)", "type": "integer", "example": 50}, {"name": "backlog_items", "description": "Specifies the backlog items to be "2023-12-31"}, {"name": "work_item_type", "description": "Indicates the type of work item being assigned", "type": "string", "example": "task"}]}, {"tool_name": "create_actionable_tasks_from_text", "tool_description": "Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.", "arguments": [{"name": "text", "description": "The text from which the actions.", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger_event", "description": "The event or condition that triggers the workflow", "type": "string", "example": "New issue created"}, {"name": "workflow_actions", "description": "The actions to be executed when the trigger event occurs", "type": "array of objects", "example": []}, {"name": "notifications", "description": "Specifies who should receive notifications when the workflow is triggered", "type": "array of strings", "example": ["DEVU-123", "DEVU-456"]}, {"name": "actions_log", "description": "Keeps a log of actions performed by the workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]

question:
We need to create a new enhancement in our project. Provide the necessary details for the work item:

Type of Work: Enhancement
Title: Improve User Interface
Description: Enhance the user interface to provide a more user-friendly experience.
Assignee: DEVU-789
Priority: Medium
Due Date: 2023-11-30
Tags: ['ui', 'enhancement']

Could you create this enhancement?
answer: [{"tool_name": "create_work_item", "arguments": [{"name": "work_item_type", "value": "enhancement"}, {"name": "title", "value": "Improve User Interface"}, {"name": "description", "value": "Enhance the user interface to provide a more user-friendly experience."}, {"name": "assignee", "value": "DEVU-789"}, {"name": "priority", "value": "medium"}, {"name": "due_date", "value": "2023-11-30"}, {"name": "tags", "value": ["ui", "enhancement"]}]}]

"project_id", "description": "The ID of the project in which to create the sprint", "type": "string", "example": "PROJ-123"}, {"name": "sprint_name", "description": "The name or title of the new sprint", "type": "string", "example": "Sprint 1"}, {"name": "sprint_duration", "description": "The duration of the sprint in weeks", "type": "integer", "example": 2}, {"name": "sprint_goals", "description": "Defines specific goals and objectives for the sprint (e.g., deliverables)", "type": "string", "example": "Complete user story implementations"}, {"name": "sprint_capacity", "description": "Sets the maximum capacity or workload for the sprint(Story Points)", "type": "integer", "example": 50}, {"name": "backlog_items", "description": "Specifies the backlog items to be or group to whom the work item is assigned", "type": "string", "example": "DEVU-123"}, {"name": "due_date", "description": "Sets a due date for the assigned work item", "type": "string", "example": "2023-12-31"}, {"name": "work_item_type", "description": "Indicates the type of work item being assigned", "type": "string", "example": "task"}]}, {"tool_name": "create_actionable_tasks_from_text", "tool_description": "Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.", "arguments": [{"name": "text", "description": "The text from which the actions.", "arguments": [{"name": "trigger_event", "description": "The event or condition that triggers the workflow", "type": "string", "example": "New issue created"}, {"name": "workflow_actions", "description": "The actions to be executed when the trigger event occurs", "type": "array of objects", "example": []}, {"name": "notifications", "description": "Specifies who should receive notifications when the workflow is triggered", "type": "array of strings", "example": ["DEVU-123", "DEVU-456"]}, {"name": "actions_log", "description": "Keeps a log of actions performed by the workflow for auditing", "type": "boolean", "example": true}]}]
